img_text: VOTED TO CONDEMN NATIONAL EMERGENCY GOP SENATORS PAUL (KY) LEE (UT) COLLINS (ME) MURKOWSKI (AK) ALEXANDER (TN) ROMNEY (UT) WICKER (MS BLUNT (MO) PORTMAN (OH) RUBIO (FL) TOOMEY (PA) MORAN (KS) 12 SENATE REPUBLICANS VOTE WITH DEMOCRATS TO BLOCK TRUMP'S EMERGENCY DECLARATION AMERICA'S NEWSROOM FOX NEWS
